main.summary: A forward-only writer for serializing data into a of .

property.name: Position
property.summary: Gets the current write position (the number of bytes written) in the buffer.

property.name: Length
property.summary: Gets the total length of the underlying buffer.

property.name: Remaining
property.summary: Gets the number of bytes remaining in the buffer that can be written to.

property.name: WrittenSpan
property.summary: Gets a read-only span representing the portion of the buffer that has been written to so far.

constructor.name: Constructor
constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct over the specified buffer.
constructor.param: The byte span to write into.

method.name: TryWriteByte
method.summary: Tries to write a single byte to the buffer.
method.returns: True if the byte was written successfully; otherwise, false if there was insufficient space.

method.name: TryWriteBytes
method.summary: Tries to write a sequence of bytes to the buffer.
method.param: The source span of bytes to write.
method.returns: True if the bytes were written successfully; otherwise, false if there was insufficient space.

method.name: TryWriteRandom
method.summary: Tries to fill a portion of the buffer with cryptographically strong random bytes.
method.param: The number of random bytes to write.
method.returns: True if the random bytes were written successfully; otherwise, false if there was insufficient space.

method.name: TryWriteGuid
method.summary: Tries to write a 16-byte to the buffer.
method.returns: True if the Guid was written successfully; otherwise, false if there was insufficient space.

method.name: TryWriteInt64BigEndian
method.summary: Tries to write a 64-bit integer to the buffer in big-endian format.
method.returns: True if the value was written successfully; otherwise, false if there was insufficient space.

method.name: TryWriteUInt16BigEndian
method.summary: Tries to write a 16-bit unsigned integer to the buffer in big-endian format.
method.returns: True if the value was written successfully; otherwise, false if there was insufficient space.

method.name: TryWriteUInt128BigEndian
method.summary: Tries to write a 128-bit unsigned integer to the buffer in big-endian format.
method.returns: True if the value was written successfully; otherwise, false if there was insufficient space.

main.summary: A forward-only reader for parsing data from a of .

property.name: Position
property.summary: Gets the current read position in the buffer.

property.name: Remaining
property.summary: Gets the number of bytes remaining in the buffer that can be read.

constructor.name: Constructor
constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct over the specified buffer.
constructor.param: The read-only byte span to read from.

method.name: TryReadByte
method.summary: Tries to read a single byte from the buffer.
method.param: When this method returns, contains the byte read, or default if the read failed.
method.returns: True if the byte was read successfully; otherwise, false.

method.name: TryReadBytes
method.summary: Tries to read a sequence of bytes from the buffer as a slice.
method.param: The number of bytes to read.
When this method returns, contains a slice of the buffer, or an empty span if the read failed.
method.returns: True if the slice was read successfully; otherwise, false.

method.name: TryReadGuid
method.summary: Tries to read a 16-byte from the buffer.
method.param: When this method returns, contains the Guid read, or default if the read failed.
method.returns: True if the Guid was read successfully; otherwise, false.

method.name: TryReadInt64BigEndian
method.summary: Tries to read a 64-bit integer in big-endian format from the buffer.
method.param: When this method returns, contains the value read, or default if the read failed.
method.returns: True if the value was read successfully; otherwise, false.

method.name: TryReadUInt16BigEndian
method.summary: Tries to read a 16-bit unsigned integer in big-endian format from the buffer.
method.param: When this method returns, contains the value read, or default if the read failed.
method.returns: True if the value was read successfully; otherwise, false.

method.name: TryReadUInt128BigEndian
method.summary: Tries to read a 128-bit unsigned integer in big-endian format from the buffer.
method.param: When this method returns, contains the value read, or default if the read failed.
method.returns: True if the value was read successfully; otherwise, false.
